name: Muchacho
desc: Bold Mexican-inspired roasts, killer cold brews. Vibrant, plant-filled space for urban snobs.

name: The Lab Coffee - West Tampa
desc: Precision espresso lab, single-origins from small farms. Sleek, experimental vibe.

name: Stumptown Coffee Roasters
desc: Pioneer of direct-trade beans, flawless Hair Bender blends. Iconic, woodsy PNW charm.
